item.title: Shell_lab
item.author: yewentao
item.description: 在这个lab中，我们将通过开发一个简洁但完整的unix shell程序来对进程控制、信号机制等概念有进一步的认知。源码地址：[https://github.com/yewentao256/CSAPP_15213/tree/main/shelllab]

item.title: Cachelab
item.author: yewentao
item.description: In this lab, we will write a small C program that simulates the behavior of a cache memory and optimize a small matrix transpose function. Source: [https://github.com/yewentao256/CSAPP_15213/tree/main/cachelab]

item.title: CSAPP Class Notes
item.author: yewentao
item.description: My note while learning through CSAPP-15213 videos. Including Overview, Bits, Bytes, and Integers, Floating Point, Machine Level Programing, Program Optimization and Memory. Source: [https://github.com/yewentao256/CSAPP_15213]

item.title: Attacklab
item.author: yewentao
item.description: Attacklab from CSAPP 15213, including P1-Code Injection Attacks and P2-Return-Oriented Programming. It’s a little bit hard, please be patient and gradually find your way out, best wishes! Source: [https://github.com/yewentao256/CSAPP_15213/tree/main/attacklab]

item.title: Bomblab
item.author: yewentao
item.description: Bomblab from CSAPP 15213, including 6 normal phases and 1 extra secret-phase. It’s a little bit hard, please be patient and gradually find your way out, good luck! Source: [https://github.com/yewentao256/CSAPP_15213/tree/main/bomblab]
